about_the_game:
Cold Chains is a first-person survival horror game set in an inhospitable environment full of mysteries.

After waking up from a years-long coma, you find yourself alone in an abandoned hospital and must search for answers and find a way out of this nightmare filled with violent creatures and hopeless agony.

Explore the locations, taking advantage of what you find along the way. You are not the first to be in this place and you will not be the last. Use the luggage left by those who fell in the past, but be careful not to be the next to perish in this haunted place.

Free Exploration

Explore an open map with many interiors and threats.

Looting and Survival

Equip yourself with whatever you find along the way. The journey will not be easy and you will need everything you can find to survive and find the way out.

Fight

Destroy any threat that stands in your way with a vast arsenal lost throughout the place.

Different Game Modes

Finish your journey in Story Mode and enjoy endless procedural dungeon crawling mode.

Cold Chains is a classic Survival Horror experience that includes exploration, combat and puzzles.
Fight for your life, escape or become an imprisoned wanderer!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence and gore which is not appropriate for all ages.

short_description: Wandering through a cold place where insanity is confused with reality, you must find answers as to why you are in this place and find the way out as quickly as possible, before you become one of the chained people who wander seeking for its lost humanity.
